text:
Hi

I would like mod_status keep a count of sent HTTP status codes. 

Best Regards.
creator: ze@nbox.org

text:
As a practical matter, it can't, and won't.

Mod_status allows for extensions, which could tally and present such information.  Mod_bmx, a third party module available from github, is one such module which tallies requests by vhost by status code.
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text:
Note that the mod_bmx tabulation is presented in a json format, but the module could be enhanced to present a mod_status html table as well.

The purpose of mod_status is to present the scoreboard, which doe not assemble tabulations because it performs no cross-worker locking to protect such data.  That would come at a cost of 2%-4% of server performance, which is why that core nodule would not be modified.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
